entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
